SEO_TITLE: Rios MD Plastics - Plastic, Aesthetic and Reconstructive Surgery
SEO_DESCRIPTION: Enhance your beauty, with the best and most innovative techniques, both in surgical and non-surgical procedures

BANNER.BUSINESS_HOURS: Mon - Fri 11 am - 8 pm / Sat 10 am - 2 pm (PST)

HERO_DESCRIPTION: BOARD CERTIFIED PLASTIC, AESTHETIC AND RECONSTRUCTIVE SURGEON
HERO_TAG: BOARD CERTIFIED PLASTIC, AESTHETIC AND RECONSTRUCTIVE SURGEON
INTRO: Welcome to the ideal place to have that procedure which will enhance your beauty, always using the best and latest technology in surgical and non-surgical procedures, always prioritizing your safety. Our goal is to make you feel and look as you have always imagined

TESTIMONIALS.TESTIMONIAL_TEXT: My experience with Dr. Andrei Rios was fantastic! Not only did he listen to me on exactly what I wanted, he also made me feel confident going through my liposuction surgery. My results have been incredible, I feel beautiful and confident. Without a doubt, I recommend him one hundred percent.

Excellent doctor, excellent results, because of my body type, I wanted a natural look and I was left with a 60cm waist with super natural abs and a fabulous booty. The most important thing is that Dr. Andrei Rios explains everything step by step, so you don’t have any questions before and after the surgery. 100% recommendable!

Dr. Andrei Rios is a professional. From the moment I met him, he generated a total confidence to carry out my surgery with him. I am very happy with my results, I feel very good about myself and I look as I have always wanted, I highly recommend him.

My results with Dr. Andrei have been excellent! He has always been willing to clarify all my doubts and give his point of view to get the best results. I received the best attention from him and his team.

FOOTER.FOOTER_DISCLAIMER: Dr. Andrei Ríos provides information on this website or through his communication means such as mail and social networks for informational and educational purposes only. The content of these is not a substitute for a professional diagnosis, opinion, treatment or service. The material displayed here should not be used to substitute a doctor-patient relationship. You should always seek the advice of your Board Certified Plastic Surgeon to resolve your questions or concerns about your medical treatment. Photos displayed are shared with prior permission from patients, and are for demonstration purposes only.

FOOTER_LOCATION.TITLE: Location
FOOTER_LOCATION.LOCATION: Blvrd Gral Rodolfo Sánchez Taboada 10488, Zona Urbana Rio Tijuana, 22010 Tijuana, B.C., México

CONTENT.DESCRIPTION_1: Dr. Andrei Ríos is a Board Certified Plastic Surgeon, graduated as an M.D. from the School of Medicine of the Instituto Tecnológico y de Estudios Superiores de Monterrey, in which he was awarded with an honorable mention for his great academic performance. He completed the specialty of General Surgery (5 years), later he graduated from the subspecialty of Plastic and Reconstructive Surgery at the Universidad Autónoma de Nuevo León, in one of the highest academic degree hospitals in Mexico, being appointed Chief of residents of his specialty, as well as a Distinguished Resident for his excellent work during his preparation. In addition, he completed a Fellowship in Aesthetic Surgery, endorsed by the same university.
CONTENT.DESCRIPTION_2: He has international experience, rotating through different hospitals in the United States such as the California Pacific Medical Center in San Francisco, UTSouthwestern in Dallas, Baylor School of Medicine in Houston and Shriners Hospital for Children in Galveston.
CONTENT.DESCRIPTION_3: In addition, during his training, he carried out research work, for which he has published scientific articles in national and international journals, as well as participated as an organizer and speaker at Meetings and Symposiums.
CONTENT.DESCRIPTION_4: Dr. Andrei Ríos is passionate about body contouring, which includes liposuction, fat transfer (BBL), lipectomy or abdominoplasty, in addition he performs highly complex cosmetic surgeries, such as post weight loss reconstructive surgery, breast augmentation, reduction or lifting, rhinoplasty, blepharoplasty and otoplasty, among others.
CONTENT.DESCRIPTION_5: His priority is the safety of his patients, as well as helping them to accomplish their expectations and together achieve the results they want.

DESCRIPTIONS.DESCRIPTION_2: Blvd. Sánchez Taboada #10488, Zona Urbana Río Tijuana Int. 401, C.P. 22010, Tijuana, Baja California
